vendor_name: Oaks Port Stephens Pacific Blue Resort
title: Idyllic Oaks Resort Studio Stay in the Heart of Port Stephens with Tropical Lagoon Pool
description:
Escape to an idyllic haven on New South Wales' coastline in Salamander Bay. This prime location offers a relaxing getaway, perfect for experiencing the tranquil bay and laidback coastal lifestyle of Port Stephens.

After busy days exploring the region's best, retreat to your light-filled room and make a splash in the resort's impressive lagoon pool, one of the largest in Australia. When it's time to pamper yourself, head to the Japanese-inspired steam room or keep up your wellness routine at the onsite fitness centre.

Just 2.5 hours from Sydney and less than an hour from Newcastle, Port Stephens is known for its spectacular natural scenery, dramatic sand dunes, crystal-clear aquamarine waters and vibrant dining and shopping culture.

Embark on an unforgettable swimming experience with dolphins in the open ocean, glide across the calm waters of the bay on a sunset cruise or in the winter months spot humpback whales migrating from Antarctica, a spectacular natural show.
location_description: Oaks Port Stephens Pacific Blue Resort
offer_address: 265 Sandy Point Road, Salamander Bay, New South Wales 2317, Australia

title: Port Stephens Boutique Waterfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Rick Stein Two-Course Dinner & Masterclass

title: Hamptons-Style Port Stephens Waterfront Escape with Daily Sparkling Wine Breakfast & Two-Course Lunch
description:
Discover bayfront beauty in abundance when you stay at this idyllic Hamptons-style resort. The Anchorage Hotel & Spa is a true haven of luxury, exuding breezy waterfront style from its beautifully appointed rooms and suites, and with direct access to the beach. Kick your feet up in coastal-inspired interiors and bask in panoramic marina views as you search the glistening waters of Australia’s dolphin capital for signs of aquatic wildlife.

The heart of the hotel's opulent offerings lies at Spa Lucca, a revered retreat spa providing top-to-toe treatments using purely Australian ingredients. Enjoy award-winning food at The Galley Kitchen, or try a selection of fine whiskeys and cocktails at Moby's Bar, named after the great whale. But if kicking back is more your style, just sip the day away at the Poolside Bar and enjoy the ambience of the sparkling infinity pool.
offer_address: 26 Corlette Point Road, Corlette 2315, NSW, Australia

title: Port Stephens Waterfront Apartment with Direct Beach Access for up to 8 Guests
description:
Wake up to the sound of the ocean and step straight from your apartment onto the golden sands of Wanda Beach when you stay at Panarea, Port Stephens. This waterfront apartment in Salamander Bay offers three bedrooms and sleeps up to eight guests, making it ideal for families or small groups of friends. 

Admire the sunrise from your private outdoor area, furnished with couches, sunbeds and a gas BBQ. Right here is the perfect place to enjoy your complimentary twin pack of wine. Your escape also includes a dolphin spotting and sandboarding experience for two and a 12pm late checkout.
